item.title: Hack: Removing Google Home Mini Microphones
item.description: I had a problem. I love music, and I love techonology, but not Big Brother. Shouldn’t tech be responsible, free (as in freedom), and in our hands? Mustn’t there be a way to bring audio in on the cheap without the big G smuggling itself in as well? I did some thinking. This was my dissonance. The desire to implement the Google Home ecosystem cheap and seamless wireless audio and (maybe) smart assistant, and a healthy dose of paranoia (toss a stone and find dozens of articles).
